Chinedu Okoli (amụrụ 23 Nọvemba 1983), mara amara site na aha ogbo ya Flavour N'abania ma ọ bụ nanị Flavour, bụ onye Naijiria na- abụ abụ, onye na-ede abụ na onye na-eme ihe ọtụtụ ihe
Ọ malitere ọrụ egwu ya dị ka onye na-akụ nkụ maka ụka dị n'ime obodo
Flavour bụ onye ama ama n'ofe Afrịka na ụwa niile maka egwu egwu ya " Nwa Baby (Ashawo Remix)"
Ọ bịanyere aka na ya ugbu a na 2nite Entertainment.
Na oge Puku abụọ na ise, o wepụtara onwe ya aha mpụta mbụ album N'abania
Na 2010, Flavor weputara album studio ya nke abụọ, Uplifted
Ndị otu " Nwa Baby (Ashawo Remix)", " Adamma " na " Oyi Remix " kwadoro ya
Ihe ịga nke ọma nke album ahụ mere Flavor ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe na Africa
Edebere ya akwụkwọ ka ọ rụọ n'ọtụtụ egwu egwu na mmemme ọha na ' esochi mwepụta Uplifteddị ka
